archimate:Requirement.name: SC.1.3.4a: a) provide information describing the software components used in products and services, including software provenance (e.g. via the use of Software Identification (SWID) tags)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
